events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position. Our team will review your submitted resume and background shortly.
Your application has been categorized under Engineering jobs specifically for the Software Engineer role to ensure you are reviewed by the appropriate team.
A recruiter specializing in technical hires has been assigned to your application and will be reaching out to guide you through the next steps of the hiring process.
We conducted an initial screening to assess your experience and technical skills. Based on this, you are moving forward to the technical interview stage.
Thank you for confirming your availability for the upcoming technical interview scheduled next week. We appreciate your prompt response.
Your technical interview is scheduled for May 20th at 3 PM UTC. Please prepare for coding challenges and system design discussions.
You successfully completed the technical interview. The panel was impressed with your problem-solving skills and coding proficiency.
An HR interview has been arranged for May 25th at 11 AM UTC to discuss company culture and your career goals.
The HR interview went well, and you demonstrated a great fit with the company values and team environment.
We are pleased to extend a formal offer for the Software Engineer role, including competitive salary and benefits, to welcome you to our team.
You have provided positive feedback regarding the offer and expressed excitement about joining the engineering team.
Your acceptance of the job offer has been confirmed. We are excited to have you onboard as our new Software Engineer.
Onboarding has officially started with the introduction of company policies, access to required tools, and team orientation sessions.
The hiring process is now officially closed. The candidate has successfully joined the engineering team and all initial setups are complete.
